channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Steven Van Zandt Undergoes Surgery, Will Miss Upcoming E Street Band Shows
item.description: Sending healing vibes to @StevieVanZandt! 🎸 Wishing him a speedy recovery so he can rock out with the E Street Band soon! 🎶💪 #GetWellSoon

item.title: Joy Orbison, Overmono, & Skiifall – “Lippy”
item.description: 🎵 Dive into the infectious beats of "Lippy" by Joy Orbison, Overmono, & Skiifall! Let the music take you on a wild ride! 🚀 #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Big Freedia Will Feature Tamar Braxton, Billy Porter on New Gospel LP
item.description: Let the gospel grooves lift you up! 🙌 Big Freedia is bringing the star power on their latest album! 🔥 #GospelVibes #CollabsOnPoint

item.title: Little Simz to Tour North America This Fall
item.description: 🎉 Little Simz is bringing her 🔥 energy to North America this Fall! Who's ready for an unforgettable tour? 🌟 #LittleSimz #TourAnnouncement

item.title: Dolly Parton announces 2025 Las Vegas residency
item.description: 🎶✨ Vegas, get ready to be dazzled by the one and only Dolly Parton in 2025! 💃🌟 #DollyParton #LasVegas #ResidencyGoals
